task.title: Setting the Organization Default Account Preferences
task.abstract: Staff users must set organziational defaults to ensure taxes are accurately and reliablely applied to items, and that there are designated default accounts for tax liability and tax locale.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Apps Quick Link in the Framework application.
Select Fonteva Orders from among the list of Registered Apps and click on eBusiness User/Profile Preferences to display the Organization Default Accounting Preferences.
Select the Calculate Sales Tax checkbox to enable taxes on items.
Designate the appropriate GL account using the Tax Account lookup.
Enter the default Tax Locale and click the Update Organization Wide Default Preferences button.

taskbody.result: Tax calculations are enabled for the organization.
